   contain the root `toctree` directive.

.. _command-game-Blackjack:

Blackjack
=================================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2


Commands
---------

   **$blackjack new**
      Creates a new Blackjack game between you and an AI dealer who follows traditional dealer rules.

   **$blackjack hit**
      Another card will be added to your hand

   **$blackjack stay**
      Your turn will be ended, and the Dealer's turn will begin

   **$blackjack remake**
      Resets the game to allow you to make a new game using *$blackjack new*
